title: Look Up Loyalty Points Balance
description: A customer calls to ask how many loyalty points they have.

tasks.description: Ask the customer for their name or phone number to find their loyalty account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent gets the information needed to find the account.

tasks.description: Look up the customer's account in the customer relationship management (CRM) system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent finds the customer's loyalty profile.

tasks.description: Inform the customer of their current points balance and any available rewards.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer receives an accurate answer to their question.
